body: Hi Claudia, As Abraham pointed out, Octopus will be a better match for a multi objective optimization. However, the current Octopus version does not work with Gh 9.0076 (Crashes Rhino) so I am not able to provide a workflow for Octopus. I have set up something using Galapagos that meets your criteria. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/C31AgRiB4u7h6c4H3MagUlPqYx2H5GhL0FiZ8PI2Pv8*TvZt4EdZiiRBsrmNil3MXHePF2IoOP0JYx2eYEEMUwybPcuh7Uji/Galapagos.JPG) Please find the file attached. Hope this helps. -Devang
